text:
Two persons were arrested here on the charge of smuggling ganja to Kerala from Andhra Pradesh through Theni on Sunday. The arrested were K. Siddhique (32) and Salim (41) of Ukkadupatti in Ernakulam district in Kerala. Four and a half kg of ganja worth Rs.1 lakh was seized from them.

A special police team saw them standing at Palanichettipatti bus stand during a routine surveillance. After investigation, they found that the duo had hidden ganja in their shoulder bags.
title: Ganja smuggling: two arrested
